article_title: Financial Advisers, Clients Grapple with Inversion-Induced Tax Hits
article_text:
Medtronic Inc.'s plan to buy Covidien PLC and establish Ireland as its legal headquarters has created a new challenge for advisers such as Anthony Ogorek.

One of Mr. Ogorek's retired clients who owns Medtronic shares reached out to him recently for guidance after receiving a letter from the medical-technology company informing him of the...

twitter.description: Corporate inversions carry big tax consequences for shareholders. Advisers are now looking for ways to help their affected clients.
twitter.title: Grappling with Inversion-Induced Tax Hits
